meanings.definition: A person who believes in postmillennialism.
meanings.sent1: The postmillennialist was hopeful about the future.
meanings.sent2: The postmillennialist studied the prophecies in detail.
meanings.sent3: The postmillennialist joked that they would throw a party when their beliefs came true.
meanings.sent4: The postmillennialist's optimism shone like a beacon in the community.
meanings.sent5: The postmillennialist's faith in progress was unwavering.

meanings.sent1: The postmillennialist viewpoint was discussed in the lecture.
meanings.sent2: The postmillennialist interpretation of the text differed from others.
meanings.sent3: The postmillennialist decorations at the event were futuristic and bright.
meanings.sent4: The postmillennialist vision painted a picture of a harmonious society.
meanings.sent5: The postmillennialist philosophy inspired many with its hope for a better world.
